about_the_game:
Pacific Life is a first-person game where you start with only a few tools in a small village. What happens next is all yours!




Stat your new life on Pacific Island!

  • Design your own voxel objects
  • Gather ressources to build them or trade
  • Hire bots to make the hard work for you
  • Manage your empire and make Pacific Island great again!




A whole 4km² Island for you to explore, gather, and to build on!
Until.. you get a way to reach more lands?



Design your own objects and buidling using our simple to use voxel-based object editor!



Go gather some ressources, you will need them to build, or make money out of it!
But be careful, some of them, will never come back!





Build the objects you designed using the precious ressources you gathered and expand your lands!


So join Pacific Life now and start your new adventure!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz or AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 440 or AMD Radeon HD 5850 or Intel HD Graphics 4000 with 512 MB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7750 with 1 GB VRAM or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Start a new life and see where it leads you! Build your house or work hard to buy one. Become a leader or just live by your own, the choice is yours! Gather, build, craft and improve!
